section.title: We Need Feedback!
section.para: If you find a typographical error, or know how this guide can be improved, we would love to hear from you. Submit a report in Bugzilla against the product &PRODUCT; and the component &BOOKID;. The following link takes you to a pre-filled bug report for this product: &BZURL;.

Fill out the following template in Bugzilla's Description field. Be as specific as possible when describing the issue and include some of the surrounding text so we can find and fix the problem quickly.
